purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe a semiconductor material product that may reside inside an integrated circuit, or that may be a discrete active component, or that may be included as a component in an electronic assembly. Terminal information is supported, including explicit shape data.
